scripts.docs: documentation build lib/MediaServer.js lib/*.js --shallow -o docs -f html && documentation build lib/MediaServer.js lib/*.js --shallow -o api.md -f md --markdown-toc false
scripts.package: tar cvzf build/medooze-media-server.tgz  `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-media-server/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-media-server/|"` external/* media-server/src/* media-server/include/* media-server/ext/libdatachannels/src/* lib/* package.json index.js  binding.gyp  README.md src
scripts.dist: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build --jobs=max && mkdir -p dist && tar cvzf dist/medooze-media-server-`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`.tgz `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-media-server/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-media-server/|"` package.json index.js   README.md lib/* build/Release/medooze-media-server.node
